title: Real Madrid 0-1 Barcelona in Copa del Rey: Eder Militao own goal gives Barca first leg advantage
description: An own goal from Eder Militao gives disciplined Barcelona victory over Real Madrid in the first leg of their Copa del Rey semi-final.

description: Sources in the energy industry say some firms have already priced in support for bills continuing.
